name: BB Salary Calculator
body: BuzzerBeater extension for Chrome ================================= Installing on Firefox: ---------------------- * Download the XPI file, save it somewhere. * File -> Open File. Choose the XPI file you just downloaded. * A window will open. Answer "Install". * Done. Installing on Chrome: --------------------- * Download the CRX file. Save it somewhere. * Click on the settings icon (it's the thing that looks like three horizontal lines, on the top right of your window, right next to the URL bar). * Click on Tools -> Extensions. See, exactly like this: * The Extensions page just opened in a new tab. Cool. * Open the folder that contains the CRX file you downloaded a few seconds ago. * Take the file that you downloaded before, and drag it over the page. * Accept the permissions by clicking on "Add" (or cancel if you don't like being told what to do). * Open BuzzerBeater and look at your roster page, at a player's page, or at the transfer list page. The extension will show the projected salary, based on Josef Ka's and Wozzvt's formulas. * Enjoy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
